about_the_game:
Payday 2 is getting its first Tailor Pack to celebrate the new outfits system in the game. Tailor Pack 1 adds four new thematic suits with five color variations for each one - for a total of 20 new outfits!

New outfits
The following new outfits are available in this DLC, each with five color variations:
  • The Showman
  • The Casual Formal
  • The Sunny Rico
  • The Classic

This DLC is also part of the Border Crossing Bundle.

DISCLAIMER: The outfits customization system is available to all PAYDAY 2 base game owners for free with the Silk Road update.
